Package org.jsweet.transpiler

Class ConfiguredDirectory

java.lang.Object
org.jsweet.transpiler.ConfiguredDirectory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class ConfiguredDirectory extends Object implements Closeable
A wrapper for directories that are either simple paths, or temporary ones that should be removed whenever possible.
Author:
Christian Kohlschütter
